bug.summary: Unions with multiple cases not properly unmarshalled
bug.text: When a union with multiple case labels for a single member was unmarshalled, its internal initialised flag was not correctly set, meaning the receiver could not change the case label as they should be able to.
Numerous problems in fixed point rounding.

bug.summary: Rare failure in GIOP 1.2 system exception marshalling
bug.text: The GIOP message length was sometimes incorrectly set when marshalling system exceptions in GIOP 1.2.
System exceptions were incorrectly marshalled in GIOP 1.1.

bug.summary: Incorrect retry semantics with location forwarding
bug.text: Retries to IORs with multiple addresses in did not work correctly after a location forward.

bug.summary: System id policy did not work with default servant
bug.text: An incorrect assertion in the POA meant default servants and servant managers could not be used in POAs with the system id policy.

bug.summary: Very large giopMaxMsgSize values did not work
bug.text: The way giopMaxMsgSize was handled meant that very large values were handled incorrectly.

bug.summary: SSL connections did not time out
bug.text: Timeouts did not occur at the time SSL connections were established.
